Instance.description: Debug interaction to spawn a Sim with the given age and gender.

TunableEnum.name: age
TunableEnum.description: The age of the Sim to be created.

TunableVariant.name: breed_picker
TunableVariant.description: Choose which breed you want either by specifying a picker to show or a specific breed to use. If disabled, breed will be random.

TunableTuple.name: picker
TunableTuple.description: Use a picker to allow the user to specify what breed they would like.

Tunable.name: picker
Tunable.description: Reference to the picker interaction you would like to use in order to show the picker.

TunableTuple.name: specific_breed
TunableTuple.description: Specify the tag associated with the specific type of breed you would like.

TunableEnum.name: breed_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag of the breed you would like to use.

TunableEnum.name: gender
TunableEnum.description: The gender of the Sim to be created.

TunableEnum.name: species
TunableEnum.description: The species of the Sim to be created.
